title: Mufti Advised Hitler on Holocaust, Says Middle East Forum Scholar (The Middle East Forum)
text: ( Source : The Middle East Forum ) Noted expert and Middle East Forum scholar Dr. Wolfgang G. Schwanitz responds to criticism of Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu . Schwanitz, a leading expert on ties between Nazis and Islamists, says
